summary: Alice lives in a lonely castle far from the city. She tries to distract herself from the ghost by putting firewood into the fire. She knows the ghost will be in the chapel every night. Alice checks the chapel from her lodge window, seeing the chapel on the hill. She sees a figure coming from the chapel, possibly the ghost.
